@@ -538,0 +538,2 @@ +

MANUAL

+

Set to true to execute manual tests.

@@ -458,0 +458,1 @@
+
@@ -515,0 +516,4 @@
+#### MANUAL
+
+Set to `true` to execute manual tests.
+

@@ -209,1 +209,1 @@

+        AOT_JDK MANUAL $(CUSTOM_JTREG_SINGLE_KEYWORDS), \
@@ -916,0 +916,6 @@
+  ifeq ($$(JTREG_MANUAL), true)
+    $1_JTREG_BASIC_OPTIONS += -manual
+  else
+    $1_JTREG_BASIC_OPTIONS += -automatic
+  endif
+
